game.name: Inner Voice
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Step into the world of "Inner Voice", where the silence is louder than screams. In this atmospheric horror experience you will uncover long-buried secrets as the story unfolds. Every creak and every whisper holds a part of this story. Are you ready to face this nightmare?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into the world of "Inner Voice", where the silence is louder than screams. In this atmospheric horror experience you will uncover long-buried secrets as the story unfolds. Every creak and every whisper holds a part of this story. Are you ready to face this nightmare?
